Question: Q1. Why is close attention to data standards needed when using time series models in environmental science? What are the risks of not following data standards?
Q2. How can use of time series models improve both natural resource management and ecological understanding?

Q7. Describe the three components of an ARIMA model (autoregressive, integrated, moving average) in your own words.
